a1: Paris SG are good but they spend a lot of money to win.
q2: How much are they paying for players?
a2: Too much. They bought Neymar for 222 million euros.
q3: There's something sinister with PSG spending habits.
a3: Anyone can win if they have so much money to spend
q4: That's not true. Money doesn't create talent, Paris has to have some talent to go along with their money.
a4: PSG has a lot of money and can buy great players and that will help
q5: What players do you think they should buy?
a5: I think they should buy a good striker like Harry Kane.
